name: Reading a Book you haven't read in awhile
description: Everyone should read more, and we both know you have books in your home that you haven't picked up yet. Now would be a great time to read that self-help book that Sales Bro gave you, or re-read Harry Potter series for the 5th time.

name: Take a Nap
description: Who doesn't love a good nap? Go ahead, catch up on some sleep, you deserve it.

name: Yoga
description: Let's face it your back isn't what it used to be, so why not give yoga a try? Your joints will thank you.

name: Take a Bath
description: When's the last time you actually took a bath? Go ahead and get that bath all warmed up and throw some bubbles in there. You desrrve this.

name: Get a massage
description: You always see them at the mall, the nice people that offer you the best massage of your life. Go ahead and make their day and also yours by taking them up on their offer. If its too creepy for you, try asking a friend.

name: Walk Around Gardens
description: The groundkeepers of BYUI work really hard to make the best looking gardens on campus. Show your appreciation by taking a walk through the Gardens and don't forget to stop and smell the roses.

name: Vist an Outside Museum
description: There are plenty of outside museums in the area. Go ahead and visit one of them and see what you can find.

name: Hike R Mountain
description: R Mountain is one of the easier hiking trails in the area. This makes it relaxing but also gives you time to reflect on God's creations.

name: People Watching
description: Let's be honest, people be crazy. There's nothing more entertaining then watching someone from a distance to the most interesting things. Head to a park and see what you can find.

name: Bird Watching
description: Maybe your great great grandpa knew what he was talking about when he said Bird Wathing was fun. There are tons of birds out there all giving you their best songs.

name: Cooking Together
description: Your fast food habits have gotten out of hand. Try staying in tonight and cook something new for eachother.

name: Watch a Romantic Comedy Movie
description: Tell your man to put his man card away for a little bit and enjoy a fun rom com together.

name: Make Mini- S'mores
description: Everyone loves smores, now enjoy them on a smaller level. All you need is a small fire camping stove, toothpicks, mini marshmallows, teddy grahams, and choclate chips and you have everything you need for a fun evening.

name: Build a Mini Golf Course
description: Grab some red solo cups and something to hit a golf ball with and turn your home into the mini golf course of your dreams.

name: Follow Along to a Bob Ross Painting Tutorial
description: Bob Ross has 500 free tutorials on his YouTube channel. Honor the legend by grabbing some paint supplies and follow along with one of his tutorials.

name: Disposable Camera Contest
description: Who remembers disposable cameras? This is the perfect opportunity to show off your camera skills. Make a list of fun pictures to take and try your best to take them with the camera. Then go get them developed and hang them proud.

name: Go to the Hot Springs
description: The Lava Hot Springs is a great place to relax. Treat yourselves to a relaxing day.
location: 195 N Center St, Lava Hot Springs, ID 83246

name: Get Ice Cream
description: Who doesn't love ice cream? Go take your special someone and try some new flavors!

name: Play Badminton
description: If you've never played badminton now is the perfect time to do so. Go rent some gear, watch some tutorials, and have fun!

name: Project a Movie Outside
description: Purchase an inexpensive projector and take a white sheet and hang in on a wall. Grab some camping chairs and blankets and you've got a great, fun, action packed night.

name: Learn a New Language
description: Извините, где отсюда ближайший аэропорт? See you have no idea what I just said, try learning a new language and impress your friends

name: Learn to Play a Instrument
description: We both know that you haven't pulled your recorder out since 5th grade. Go grab it and se if you can still play hot cross buns.

name: Learn a new Sport
description: Ever heard of Earthing, R-World, Hantis, Supa Punt, Blo-Ball? There are a lot of sports that you can learn to play.

name: Find a Code Project to Work On
description: Sharpen your coding skills with a new project to work on. You could try building a number guessing game, dice roll generator, calculator, weather app, or tic-tac-toe. The projects are endless!

name: Learn to Crochet
description: Crochet isn't just for the elderly anymore. Learn to crochet and give your grandma some mittens for a change.

name: Learn to Draw a Disney Character
description: Hop on to Disney+ streaming service (or borrow someone's login). Then in the search bar type in 'Sketchbook' click the first result. Here you can learn to draw 6 different Disney characters like Kuzco, Olaf, Genie, Mirabel, and Simba.

name: Learn to Slack Line
description: Think you got good balance? Try giving slack lining a try! You can find a kit on Amazon where you can purchase everything you need to get started. Tie the slack line between two trees and try walking across it.

name: Learn Archery
description: I know Hawkeye isn't the strongest of the Avengers but he sure looks cool. Try buying a archery kit and let out your inner Robin Hood.

name: Learn to Ice Skate
description: If the world ever freezes over you are gonna wish you learned ice skating. Rent some skates and give it your best shot.

name: Learn to do Photography
description: You don't need an expensive camera to get into photography. You can begin with just your phone! See what you can create!

name: Learn to Fly a Kite
description: Kites are a great IFO (Identified Flying Object) and you can learn to fly one with this activity. You can find a kit on Amazon where you can purchase everything you need to get started.

name: Uno
description: The first player to play all of the cards in their hand in each round scores points for the cards their opponents are left holding. The first player to score 500 points wins the game.Rules: https://www.ultraboardgames.com/uno/game-rules.php

name: Nintendo : Smash Bros
description: Gameplay in the Super Smash Bros. series differs from many fighting games. Instead of winning by depleting an opponent's life bar, players seek to launch their opponents off the stage and out of bounds. Characters have a damage total which rises as they take damage, represented by a percentage value that measures up to 999%. As a character's percentage rises, the character can be knocked progressively farther by an opponent's attacks.[2] To knock out an opponent, the player must knock that character outside the stage's boundaries in any direction. When a character is launched off the stage, the character can attempt to 'recover' by using jumping moves and abilities to return to the stage. Some characters have an easier time recovering onto the stage than others due to their moves and abilities. Additionally, some characters vary in weight, with lighter characters being easier to launch than heavy characters.

name: Monopoly
description: Monopoly is a multi-player economics-themed board game. In the game, players roll two dice to move around the game board, buying and trading properties, and developing them with houses and hotels. Players collect rent from their opponents, with the goal being to drive them into bankruptcy. Money can also be gained or lost through Chance and Community Chest cards, and tax squares. Rules: https://www.ultraboardgames.com/monopoly/game-rules.php

name: Cooking Competition
description: This activity requires the Game-Lead to select a list of Ingredients. The Teams will then be given an fix amount of time to prepare a meal/dish that will include all the Ingredients. The finished meals/dishes will be judge by presentation, taste and use of all ingredients.

name: Basketball
description: Basketball is a game played between two teams of five players, (Two individual can also count a team) each on a rectangular court, usually indoors. Each team tries to score by tossing the ball through the opponent's goal, an elevated horizontal hoop and net called a basket. Rules: https://www.ducksters.com/sports/basketballrules.php

name: Watch a Movie
description: Here is a list of Platforms to stream movies: Netflix, Hulu 3, Disney+ 4, HBO Max, Peacock. Here is a list of Favorites to watch: Star Wars, StrangerThings, Lord of the Rings, Inception, Harry Potter, Toy Story, Lion King, Back to the Future, Jurassic Park, Dark Knight, The GodFather, The Shining, E.T, Avengers: End Game, Thor: Ragnarok, Spider-man

name: Hammocking
description: A hanging, easily swung length of canvas or heavy netting suspended between two trees or other supports and used as a seat or bed.

name: Rope Course
description: The Ropes Course contains three levels, each more challenging than the previous level. The bottom level had moderate challenges and the top level is the most difficult. Participants are connected to the course with a continuous belay system to explore the course. Fantastic individual and group-challenge activity. (Limited to 60 participants per two-hour period. Rules: https://www.byui.edu/ropes-course/#team-building-at-ground-level)

name: Dunes
description: The Dunes are a great place to go camping, Roasting marshmellow on a open Fire or simple star gazing.

name: Pickleball
description: Pickleball is a paddle sport that combines elements of tennis, badminton, and ping-pong using a paddle and plastic ball with holes. It is a game that is appropriate for players of all ages and skill levels. Rules for pickleball are simple, making it a great introductory sport. Rules: https://www.pickleball.com/rules-how-to-play-pickleball-s/106.htm

name: Spikeball
description: Spikeball is a team sport played by two teams of two players. Opposing teams line up across from each other with the Spikeball net in the center. The ball is put in play with a serve—a hit by the server from behind the service boundary into the net to an opposing player. Rules: https://spikeball.com/pages/official-rules

name: Kan Jam
description: Kan Jam is a flying disc game, played with a flying disc and two cans into which players deflect the disc. Teams of two players take turns tossing a disc between two plastic cans, scoring points if the disc hits or is deflected into one of the cans. Rules: https://www.wku.edu/crw/intramurals/kan_jam_rules.pdf

name: CornHole
description: Cornhole is a lawn game popular in North America in which players or teams take turns throwing fabric bean bags at a raised, angled board with a hole in its far end. The goal of the game is to score points by either landing a bag on the board or putting a bag through the hole. Rules: https://www.ajjcornhole.com/cornhole-rules.php#:~:text=Cornhole%20Keynotes,throws%20until%20no%20bags%20remain
